channel.title: Our Projects on Idclang
channel.description: Recent content in Our Projects on Idclang

item.title: A Sans Font For Tulu
item.description: A modern font for Tulu was one of the first projects of IDCL. And the team decided to develop a traditional font for the Tulu language.

item.title: Ghughariyo Mahajani Unicode
item.description: Ghughariyo Mahajani Unicode font IDCL has announced a unicode font for the Mahajani script on 21st June 2021.
